description:
For colder days, wear this this hooded vest under your wetsuit or dry jacket for an extra layer of insulation to keep your head and core warm.

  • 2mm neoprene with waffle pattern locks in warmth
  • 3-panel hood has a cord lock to get the perfect fit
  • Flat seam construction for chafe-free wear
name: Xcel Insulate-XR Hooded Vest - Unisex
